# Annandale South (ward)

|elects_howmany=4
|councillor1=Ian Carruthers
|party1=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|councillor2=George Jamieson
|party2=Scottish National Party
|councillor3=Sean W. Marshall
|party3=Scottish Labour Party
|councillor4=Richard Brodie
|party4=Scottish Liberal Democrats
|towns=Annan
|scot_parl=Dumfriesshire
|scot_region=South Scotland
|westminster=Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale
}}
Annandale South is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Dumfries and Galloway Council. It elects four Councillors.
